name: blogify-social-media-app-ayusharma-ctrl
description: Blogify is a feature-rich MERN app that enables users to create, share, and engage with blogs. It offers CRUD operations, profile management, token-based email authentication, following functionality, likes and bookmarks, comment posting, and real-time updates. With 40+ REST APIs, secure login, and protected routes, Blogify provides a seamless and interactive social media experience for bloggers.
author: ayusharma-ctrl
